title: Amazon to Invest up to $4B in AI Firm Anthropic
description: Along with the cash injection, Anthropic will also have access to Amazon Web Services and assist with developing the firm's native chips.

title: Bitcoin mining takes the lead in sustainable energy use, outshining banking sector
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin mining is the most sustainably-powered industry globally, outperforming all other sectors, per Daniel Batten’s analysis. The analysis indicates that over half of the energy resources consumed in Bitcoin mining are from sustainable sources, making it a benchmark for other industries. Surprisingly, the banking sector trails behind Bitcoin mining, utilizing just under 40% […]

The post Bitcoin mining takes the lead in sustainable energy use, outshining banking sector appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: TechCrunch founder Arrington steps down from new Celsius board over constitution disagreement
description:
Arrington Capital founder Michael Arrington stepped down from his position as a board member of the new company that will take over the operations of bankrupt crypto lender Celsius. Arrington revealed that Ravi Kava would replace him on the new company’s board. Kava is a partner at Fahrenheit and an investor and advisor at the […]

The post TechCrunch founder Arrington steps down from new Celsius board over constitution disagreement appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Unpacking the BLD Token: Price Analysis and All-Time High Possibilities
description: Agoric's native token, BLD, has experienced significant price fluctuations over the past year. In this analysis, we delve deep into the price potential of BLD by comparing its current valuation with its all-time high and discussing the factors that could influence its path back to its peak.

title: Coinbase holds as much Bitcoin as Satoshi Nakamoto
description: Arkham, the blockchain analysis platform, has suggested that Coinbase is sitting on a similar amount of Bitcoin to its mysterious creator Satoshi Nakamoto, which amounts to around 5% of all Bitcoin.

title: Eureka Partners Fortifies Its Stance in Blockchain and Cryptocurrency with $40 Million Investment from Nordic Venture Innovations AB
description: Eureka Partners, a European-based native crypto fund comprised of seasoned investors and entrepreneurs who have been at the forefront of the cryptocurrency industry since its early days, is pleased to announce a substantial investment of $40 million from Nordic Venture Innovations AB, a prominent Nordic family office.

title: The Arbitrum Foundation’s treasury sees a significant increment of $59 million as unclaimed ARB tokens from a March airdrop find their way to the treasury post-claim deadline.
description: A whopping $59 million worth of unclaimed ARB tokens has bolstered the Arbitrum treasury, as the claim window for a March airdrop concluded over the weekend. Post claim deadline, 69 million unclaimed tokens, equating to 0.69% of ARB’s total supply, were channeled into the network’s treasury, amplifying its value substantially. The Arbitrum Foundation witnessed a [...]

title: Bitcoin’s Green Revolution: How Methane-Powered Mining Is Fighting Climate Change and Cutting Emissions by 8%
description: Bitcoin, often criticized for energy use, could help stabilize power grids and reduce methane emissions. Miners are shifting to green energy, aiding renewable adoption and nuclear power economics. In a world racing to secure clean energy solutions, the unconventional alliance of Bitcoin and the energy sector is stirring intrigue. People often condemned Bitcoin for its [...]

title: ETH’s Inevitable Downfall Could Lead To XRP’s Rise: Analyst
description:
Ripple (XRP) enthusiast and cryptocurrency analyst EDO FARINA, predicted in an X post yesterday that the next black swan event may be Ethereum‘s (ETH) downfall. According to the analyst, all ERC-20 tokens could fall together, after which Stellar (XLM) and XRP will be ready to absorb all the real world utility. Farina included in his […]

The post ETH’s Inevitable Downfall Could Lead To XRP’s Rise: Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.
